headline: Higher Education Summit: Speaker presentations
text: Paul Clark, director of policy, Universities UK Deborah Roseveare, head, Skills Beyond Schools Division, Directorate for Education, OECD Kathryn Jones, director of marketing and communications, Birmingham City University David Sweeney, director - research, innovation and skills, Higher Education Funding Council for England (HEFCE) Emma Leech, director of marketing, communications and recruitment, University of Nottingham
